Class Board

java.lang.Object
  edu.utsa.cs.cs4953_2012.abacus.Board

public class Board
extends java.lang.Object

A logical model of the board of an abacus.

getInstance

public static Board getInstance()
Gets the only running instance of the board. If no instance of the board exists, it makes a new instance.

getRowValueAt

public java.math.BigInteger getRowValueAt(int x,
                                          int y)
Determines the value of the bead at those particular coordinates.

Parameters:
x - The x-coordinate in question, the leftmost value being 0.
y - The y-coordinate in question, the topmost value being 0.
Returns:
The numeric value of a single bead at position (x, y).
